CreateAccount.document:
On the partner platform, create a Tencent Cloud account. After the sub-customer is registered, it will be automatically bound to the partner account. Notes:
1. Create a Tencent Cloud account and enter the email address , Mobile phone number, the partner needs to verify the validity.
2, the customer needs to add personal information for the first login
CreateAccount.name: Create customer interface

CountryCodeItem.document: Get an element type of the country code interface

members.document: The account type identification of the newly created customer. The value of this interface is: business
members.name: AccountType

members.document:
Registered email address. The caller needs to ensure the validity and correctness of the email address.
The email format must be met. For example: account@qq.com
members.name: Mail

members.document:
Account password.
Length limit: [8,20].
It must also contain numbers, letters and special symbols (!@#$%^&*() and other non-spaces)
members.name: Password

members.document: Reconfirm the password. It must be the same as the Password value
members.name: ConfirmPassword

members.document:
Customer's mobile phone number. The caller is required to ensure the validity and correctness of the mobile phone number.
Length limit: [1,32]. Global mobile phone numbers are supported. For example, 18888888888
members.name: PhoneNum

members.document: The country code of the customer. For the value, please refer to the GetCountryCodes interface GetCountryCodes. Such as 86
members.name: CountryCode

members.document: Customer's IOS2 standard country code. Refer to the GetCountryCodes interface for obtaining country codes. It needs to correspond to the CountryCode value. Such as CN
members.name: Area

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: The unique request ID, which is returned for each request. RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId
